name: Savage Hunt
description:
The game is in Progress and will be worked on more. If you find any bugs please comment it down below!

This was for the MiniJam#110

Story:

You and your friend are looking for the summoning grounds of the Chugawaga's. You find it but only to find that the people are still living there and they're not happy to see you. Now you have to active the ritual and finish what your friend had started.

____________________________________

How to Play:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around.

Don't get hit by the Chugawaga's

Your light will run out 

Collected the orbs and go to the summoning spot

R to restart if needed

Good luck, dude :)

____________________________________
